english.segment1: I meet with You. And my soul sings out. As Your word throws doubt far away. I sing to You. And my heart cries holy. Hallelujah, Father, You're near
english.segment2: My hope is in You, Lord. All the day long. I won't be shaken by drought or storm. A peace that passes understanding is my song. And I sing. My hope is in You alone
english.segment3: I wait for You. And my soul finds rest. In my selfishness You show me grace. I worship You. And my heart cries glory. Hallelujah, Father, You're here
english.segment4: I will wait on You. You are my refuge
